name: Essential Shopping
description:
Whaaaaaaaaat? You wanna buy FOOD... at the SHOPS!? FOOD?!?!? You've gotta be kidding me! That's not what we're about nowadays, the end is nigh!

Essential Shopping is a quick, casual game where the ONLY thing you need to catch is MORE toilet paper! You don't have the time for anything else and WILL be penalised for it!

Use 'A' and 'D' or the arrow keys to move to either side of the screen and try your best to get the best score you can!! This entire game is obviously a joke, so please take it like one!

Made for the first Totally Ranked Jam under the theme of 'End of the World'!

Music and Sound Design created by Benjamin Hopkins/City of Animals (@cityofanimalsmusic  /www.thecityofanimals.com /https://cityofanimals.itch.io/)
